column5: My automatic bilge pump switch stopped working.  It is the float style and i guess water got inside of it. I found this new style and i am wondering if anyone has tried it.  Is it any good?   http://www.johnson-pump.com/JPMarine/produ...timaswitch.html
If you have Mayfair pumps (yellow) they have a similar setup built into pump. Seen at Harris Boatworks Rice Lake.  Garnet
Thanks Garnet.  I am going to order one in from cabelas.
